subject: Sprains and Strains
lead_paragraph: Asafa Powell, the world-record holder in the 100 meters, has canceled plans to compete until late June because of a pulled muscle in his chest, his manager said. The move was precautionary and was not expected to affect his preparations for the Beijing Olympics in August. His first race back is expected to be the Jamaican championships in late June.
